text.チーフトレーナー、元気かな。\r\n…あの人がアンタを選んだの、\r\n少しは…: Chief Trainer, is she well? The reason \nwhy she choose you… I think I \nunderstand, maybe.
text.チーフトレーナー、元気かな。\r\n…あの人がアンタを選んだの、\r\n今はよく: Chief Trainer, how are you? …I know \nnow why she chose you. …hmmm…
text.世界中の男の人がアンタだったら…\r\n少しはアタシもマシだったかな…？\r\n: If all the men in the world were you… \nwould I be a little better off…? No, \nthat also problematic.
text.みんながトレーナーみたいな人\r\nだったら、アタシの人見知りも\r\n少しはマ: If everyone was like the trainer, my \nshyness would be a little better.
text.『べじキャロリン』の絵…\r\nちょっと上手くなったかも。\r\nべ、別に見せる: I think I've gotten a little better \nat drawing "Beji Carolyn". I didn't \nsay I would show them to you.
text.『べじキャロリン』の絵覚えてる？\r\n…ちょっと上手くなったんだよね。\r\n:
Remember the pictures in "Beji 
Carolyn"? …I got a little better at 
it, didn't I? I hope you'll take a 
look at it sometime.
text.あけましておめでとう。\r\n…先に言っておくけど、\r\nお年玉とかいらないか: Happy New Year. …I'll tell you first, \nI don't want your New Year's gift.
text.バ、バレンタインだからってなに？\r\nアタシに期待なんかしないでよ…。: What do you mean, just because it's \nValentine's Day? Don't expect \nanything from me…
text.…バレンタインかぁ。\r\nこういうの慣れてないけど…\r\nその、後でね。: Valentine's day huh? \nI'm not used to this kind of thing, \nbut later, okay.
text.チョコ…持ってきた。\r\n一応、お世話にはなってるし…\r\n礼儀っていうか。: Chocolates… I brought them. \nI've been indebted to you… \nout of courtesy, I guess.
text.チョコ持ってきたんだ。\r\nアタシみたいなウマ娘を\r\n気にかけてくれるお礼: I brought chocolate. It's \na thank you for taking care \nof a horsegirl like me…
text.星に願う…かぁ。人見知りしなく\r\nなりますように…なんて。\r\n…はっ、き: Wish upon a star… huh? I wish that I \nwould stop being shy… did you hear \nthat?
text.仮装ならマスクとかできるし、\r\n見られても平気かも…。\r\nカボチャの被り:
If it's a costume, I can wear a mask 
or something, and I might not mind 
being seen… I wonder if I can wear 
pumpkins?
text.クリスマスパーティー、\r\nドレス着てみんなで踊るんだって。\r\n…隅の方で: Christmas party, they're going to \ndress up and dance together. I'll \njust stay in the corner and be quiet.
text.プレゼント買う時、店員さんに\r\nすっごい見られたんだから。\r\n…感謝して: The clerk was staring at me while I \nwas buying the present. \n… You should be grateful.
text.プレゼント買う時、店員さんに\r\n見られて緊張したけど…\r\n頑張ったよ。…:
I was nervous when I was buying the 
present because the shopkeeper saw 
me… but I did my best. …Will you be 
happy with it?
text.年末はメジロ家で集まることも\r\n多いんだけど…大人数は、\r\nやっぱりちょ:
At the end of the year, we often get 
together at the Mejiro house… but 
I'm not sure I'm good with large 
groups.
text.アンタ、今日誕生日だったっけ。\r\n…えっと…お、おめでとう。: I thought it was your birthday today. \nWell… happy birthday.
text.あの、誕生日おめでとう。\r\n…アタシの言葉でも、\r\nお祝いになるといいけ: Happy Birthday. I hope my words will \nbe enough to celebrate.
text.プレゼント用意したから…その、\r\n受け取って。…って、ここで\r\n開けない: I've prepared a present for you… \nwell, take it. Don't open it now! \nOpen it when you are alone.
text.プレゼント用意したから…\r\nあっ、あまり期待は…ホント、\r\n大したものじ: I got you a present… Oh, don't get \nyour hopes up… it's really not that \nbig of a deal! Really!
text.誕生日のお祝いは嬉しいけど、\r\n『今日の主役』みたいに\r\n注目されると、: I'm happy to celebrate birthdays, \nbut I get nervous when I'm the \ncenter of attention…
text.確かに今日は誕生日だけど…\r\n別に、わざわざお祝いなんて…\r\n…ま、まぁ: It's true that today is my birthday… \nYou don't have to go out of your way \nto congratulate me… but, Well, ummm… thanks.
text.アタシなんかの誕生日、\r\n祝わなくても別にいいのに…\r\n…で、でも…その: You don't have to celebrate my \nbirthday… but… well, I'm glad.
text.お知らせがあるみたい。\r\n…なんだろう。: It look like there is an announcement. \n… I wonder what is it.
text.プレゼントが届いてるよ。\r\n気にかけてくれる人が\r\nいるって、幸せだよね: You have a present in the mail. \nIt's a blessing to have someone \nwho cares about you.
text.ミッションクリアしたんだ。\r\n…アタシも負けないから。: You completed the mission. \nI won't lose either.
text.ミッションクリアしたんだ。\r\n…すごいね。アタシも、\r\n負けないように頑: You completed the mission. That's \namazing. I have to do my best not to \nlose to you, too.
text.今度、イベントがあるみたい。\r\nちょっと気になるかも。\r\n…アタシでも参: I think there's an event coming up. I \nmight be a little curious. I wonder \nif I can participate?
text.…なんか賑やかだね。\r\nイベントやってるんだっけ。: …It's kind of busy, isn't it? Is \nthere an event going on?
text.なんだか体が重く…あっ、嘘。\r\n気のせい。その…放っておいて。: I feel heavy… ah, it's lie. It's just my \nimagination. Just… leave me alone.
text.…なんだか体が重いような。\r\nあっ、ううん、大丈夫。\r\nこのくらい平気だ: …I feel kind of heavy. Oh, no, I'm \nfine. I'm fine like this.
text.少し…休ませて。\r\nそうしたら、また頑張るから。: Let me… take a break. Then \nI'll work hard again.
text.はぁ…疲れてるのかな。\r\n少し休んでからでもいい？\r\nそうしたら、また頑: Huh… I guess I'm tired. Can I take a \nlittle rest first? I'll be able to work \nhard again after I do that.
text.今すっごく脚が軽いの…！\r\nねぇ、トレーニングはまだ！？\r\n早く走らせて: My legs feel so light right now…! \nHey, have you started training yet? \nLet me run faster!
text.走りたくて走りたくて、\r\n落ち着かないの…！今なら\r\nなんだってできる気: I just want to run. I just want to \nrun. I can't stop. I feel like I can \ndo anything now!
text.うん、いい感じ…！\r\nこれなら、満足のいく\r\n結果を出せそうっ。: Yes, it looks good…! This will give \nme a satisfactory result.
text.今日は、なにするの？\r\nなんでも言って。\r\n必ずこなしてみせるから！: What are you doing today? Tell me \nanything. I'll do it!
text.今日も頑張らなきゃ…\r\n予定、聞かせて。: I have to work hard today… let me \nknow what your plans are.
text.よし、今日も頑張ろっと。\r\n予定、聞かせてくれる？: Okay, I'm going to try again today. \nCan you tell me what your plans are?
text.負けたくないなら、\r\nしっかりトレーニングしなきゃね。\r\n始めよ、トレー: If you don't want to lose, you're \ngoing to have to train hard. Let's \nget started, trainer.
text.…なんだか気分が乗らないの。\r\nもっとちゃんと…頑張りたいのに。: I'm just not in the mood. \nI want to do better.
text.はぁ…。…なに？アタシが溜め息\r\nつくのなんて珍しくないでしょ。\r\nただ: Huh… What? It's not unusual for me \nto sigh. It's just that I don't feel \nlike doing it.
text.はぁ…あっ、ごめん。\r\n溜め息なんてついちゃって。\r\nでも、どうしてもや: I'm sorry. I just sighed. I'm just \nso motivated…
text.見学してる人、多くない？\r\nはぁ…やだな。こんなんじゃ、\r\n集中できない: Are there a lot of people touring, or \nis it just me? Oh… I can't \nconcentrate like this…
text.頭ではわかってるのに、\r\n脚がついていかない…。\r\nやっぱりアタシなんて: I know it's only in my head, \nbut my legs can't keep up… \nI'm still myself afterall…
text.えっ、またレースって本気？\r\n今のアタシに勝てるわけ\r\nないでしょ…！？: What, are you serious about \nracing again? There's no way \nI can win now…!?
text.えっ、またレース？\r\n…アタシだって出たいけど、\r\n今は勝てる気がしない: What, another race? …I want to \ncompete too, but I don't think I can \nwin right now…
text.…はぁ。連続でレースなんて、\r\nどういうつもりなの？: Huh. What are you doing, racing \nback-to-back?
text.…そう。\r\nでも、レースばっかりで、\r\nさすがに疲れちゃったかな…。: Yes… But all those races \nhave made me tired…
text.しっかり調整できたよね。\r\nこれならきっと勝てる…！\r\nちゃんと見てて、: I've adjusted well, haven't I? I'm \nsure I can win with this…! Watch \nme run.
text.ちゃんと準備してきたからかな、\r\n大勢の視線も怖くない…。\r\nうん、これ:
Maybe it's because I've prepared 
well, I'm not afraid of the stares of 
many people… I'm sure this will be 
fine!
text.すーはー…うん、バッチリ。\r\nこの日のために用意してきたこと、\r\n絶対に: Soooo… yeah, perfect. All the \npreparation I've done for this day, I \nwon't let it go to waste!
text.準備できてるよ。\r\nレースのイメージは掴めてるし、\r\n思いっきり走ってく: I'm ready. I have a good idea of what \nthe race is going to be like, and I'm \ngoing to ride as hard as I can.
text.ここまでわりと、順調だったよね。\r\n…大丈夫、大丈夫。この調子なら、\r\n:
So far, things have been going rather 
well, haven't they? I'll be fine, 
I'll be fine. At this rate, I should 
be able to run as usual.
text.ふぅっ…緊張もしてないし、\r\nいい感じかも。あと必要なのは\r\n気合いだよ: I'm not even nervous, so I'm feeling \ngood. All I need to do now is to be \nin high spirits……………
text.ん…少し緊張はしてるけど、\r\n問題はないかな。\r\n行ってくるね。: Well… I'm a little nervous, but I \ndon't think it's a problem. I'm off.
text.心配しなくても、大丈夫。\r\nトレーニング通りに、アタシは\r\nアタシの走り: Don't worry, I will be fine. I will \njust run as I train.
text.結構、落ち着いてるの。\r\nトレーニングの成果が\r\n出たのかな。: I am quite calm. I guess the training \nhas paid off.
text.…どうしよう、\r\n思ったより緊張してるみたい。\r\n深呼吸、深呼吸…すぅ、: …I don't know, I guess I'm more \nnervous than I thought.
text.不安はあるけど、\r\n心配しなくていいから。\r\n…できることを、するだけ。: I'm anxious, but don't worry. …I'll \njust do what I can.
text.正直、ちょっと不安もあるけど、\r\nできることをしてくるから…\r\n応援して: To be honest, I'm a little nervous, \nbut I'll do what I can.
text.気持ちが落ち着かない…。\r\n少し、焦ってるのかも。\r\n…自分らしく、走ら: I don't feel comfortable… Maybe I'm \nin a bit of a hurry. …I have to run \nlike myself.
text.観客があんなにたくさん…。\r\nああもうっ…！\r\nしっかりしてアタシ！: So many spectators… Oh my god…! \nPull yourself together, Me!
text.みんなの熱気が伝わってくる…。\r\nき、気持ちで負けちゃ\r\nダメなんだから: I can feel everyone's enthusiasm… \nI can feel everyone's enthusiasm…… \nI mustn't lose in spirit.
text.ねぇ、アタシ今どんな顔してる？\r\n…ううん、やっぱり言わないで。\r\nとに: Hey, what do I look like now? \nI don't know, don't tell me after all. \nI have to work hard anyway…
text.たくさん、頑張ったよね。: We did a lot, a lot of hard work.
text.大丈夫、大丈夫…い、行ってくる！: It's okay, it's okay… I'll be there!
text.ちゃんと気持ち、伝えなくちゃ…！: I have to tell her how I feel…!
text.アンタとやっていけるか\r\n最初は心配だったけど…\r\n今はもう平気。慣れた: I was worried at first if I could get \nalong with you… but now I'm fine. \nI'm used to it.
text.最初は不安もあったけど…\r\nトレーナーとやっていくって\r\n決めたから、も: I was worried at first, but now that \nI've decided to work with a trainer, \nI'm fine.
text.おはよう。…って、なに？\r\n挨拶しただけでしょ。\r\nそんなに見ないで。: Good morning. …What? I just said \nhello. Don't stare so much.
text.おはよう。…って、なに？\r\nそんなに見つめて…あっ。\r\nも、もしかして寝: Good morning. …What? You're \nstaring at me like that. Are you also \nsleeping in a bad habit?
text.朝から優雅に…って、難しい。\r\n眠いから、ボーッとするし…\r\nマックイー: It's hard to be graceful in the \nmorning… I'm sleepy, I'm in a daze… \nMcQueen is amazing.
text.お休みの日にランチへ行く時、\r\nみんなすごく可愛い服を\r\n着てるんだよね: When I go out to lunch on my day off, \neveryone wears the cutest clothes… \nI can't do it.
text.昼休憩、トレーニングに\r\n使えない？…べ、別に\r\n無理なんてしてないしっ: Can't we take a lunch break to work \nout? I'm not forcing myself.
text.昼休憩、トレーニングに\r\n使えないかな？…平気、\r\n別に無理なんてしてな: Can we use your lunch break for \ntraining? I'm fine, I'm not \noverworking myself.
text.こんな時間まで、まだ仕事？\r\n明日もあるんだし、無理して\r\n倒れたりなん:
Are you still working until this late? 
You have another day tomorrow, 
so don't push yourself too hard and 
fall ill, okay?
text.もうこんな時間…\r\nトレーナーはまだ仕事？\r\nその、あまり無理はしないで: It's late… is trainer still working? \nWell, you know, don't take it too hard.
text.ふぁ…んんっ、あくびが…って、\r\n今の顔、見てた！？\r\nわ、忘れて！記憶: Hmmm… yawn… did you see my face \njust now? Forget it! Erase it from \nyour memory.
text.ふぁ…んんっ、あくびが…って、\r\n今の顔、見てた！？\r\nやだな…恥ずかし: Hmmm… yawn… did you see my face \njust now? Oh no… I'm so \nembarrassed…
text.新入生がいっぱい…。\r\nみんなキラキラで眩しくて、\r\n直視できないかも…: So many new students… They are so \nsparkling and dazzling that I might \nnot be able to look at them directly…
text.暑さに気をつけなきゃ…！\r\nみんなの前で倒れたりして、\r\n目立ったら終わ: We have to watch out for the heat. \nIf I fall down in front of everyone, \nI'll end up in the spotlight…
text.枯葉の匂いもキライじゃないって\r\n思ってたら、外から焼き芋の\r\n香りが…:
I was thinking that I don't mind the 
smell of dead leaves, but then I 
smelled the aroma of baked potatoes 
coming from outside… did you think it 
was inside the school?
text.ちょっ、近づかないで！\r\n今は静電気が…ひゃっ！: Hey, don't get too close! Now there's \nstatic electricity.
text.ち、近づかないで！\r\n違うの、嫌とかじゃなくて\r\n今は静電気が…ひゃっ！:
No, no, no, stay away from me! No, 
it's not that I don't want to, it's 
just that right now the static 
electricity is… oh no!
text.『ベルちゃん』はやめてって\r\n言ってるのに、お父さんったら…\r\nあっ、や: I told you to stop calling me \n"Belle-chan", but father… ah it's \nnothing!
text.子どもの頃のことは聞かないで。\r\nいい思い出ばかりじゃないから。: Don't ask me about my childhood. \nIt's not all good memories.
text.楽しいこともあったけど、\r\n正直、子どもの頃のことは\r\nあまり思い出した: I had some fun, but to be honest, \nI don't want to remember much \nof my childhood…
text.ライアンには昔から迷惑をかける\r\nことも多かったから…もう心配は\r\nない: I has caused Ryan so much trouble in \nthe past… I'm proud to say that I \ndon't have to worry her anymore.
text.…アンタ、弟妹いる？\r\n子どもの相手とかしたことは…\r\nべ、別に、ただ聞: Do you have younger siblings? Do \nyou know how to deal with child… \nNo, no, I'm just asking.
text.ね、ねぇ、年の離れた弟妹とか\r\nいる？その…なにしてあげたら\r\n喜ぶか、: Hey, hey, do you have younger \nsiblings? I'd like you to tell me what \nI should do to make them happy.
text.メジロ家のみんなは堂々としてて、\r\nすごく立派でしょ。\r\n…アタシとは違: The Mejiros are all very respectable. \nThey are different from me.
text.メジロ家のみんなは堂々としてて、\r\nすごく立派なのに…アタシは\r\nどうし: Everyone in the Mejiro family is so \nmagnificent, and so admirable, but… \nI just can't… I just can't do it.
text.この衣装…みんなは似合うって\r\n言ってくれたけど…\r\nきっと、お世辞だよ: Everyone said I looked good in this \noutfit, but I'm sure they were just \nflattering.
text.タン、タン、ターン…♪\r\nふふっ、フワフワして…あ！？\r\nち、ちがっ、練: Tang, tang, turn… ♪ \nFufu, fluffy… ah!? \nNo, no, no, I was just practicing!
text.アタシの想いを込めた\r\n衣装なんだから、これを着て\r\n情けない走りだけは: It's a costume that I put my heart \nand soul into, I'm not going to run \npathetically wearing this…!
text.…ちょっと可愛すぎたかな。\r\nう、ううんっ、自分で決めた\r\n衣装だし、堂: …Maybe it was a little too cute. No, \nno, it's a costume I decided on, I \nhave to be proud of it…!
text.早朝トレーニングしたくても\r\n寝起きにアタシがいないと、\r\nタイキが寂し:
Even if I want to train early in the 
morning, if I is not there when I get 
up from bed, Taiki is going to miss 
me…
text.漫画だと、よく手作りの\r\nお弁当を作ってるけど…\r\nアタシにも作れるかな: In the manga, they often make \nhomemade lunches… I wonder if I \ncan make them too…
text.夜のトレーニングって落ち着く…。\r\n誰からの視線も感じないし、\r\n集中し: Training at night is so relaxing… I \ndon't feel anyone looking at me and I \ncan concentrate on my work…!
text.…お花見って好き。\r\n楽しいしキレイだし、\r\nみんなが桜に注目してるから:
…I like cherry blossom viewing. 
It's fun, it's beautiful, and everyone 
is paying attention to the cherry 
blossoms.
text.昨日の夜中、雷みたいな音が\r\n聞こえた気が…はぁ、\r\n雨は好きなんだけど: I thought I heard something like \nthunder last night at midnight… haha, \nI like rain, but…
text.確か、今日はメジロ家のみんなと\r\nお茶会だよね。…ふふっ、\r\n紅葉の下で:
If I'm not mistaken, today is a tea 
party with everyone in the Mejiro 
family under the autumn leaves.… 
Fufu, I'm looking forward to it.
text.甘いものを控えて、それから…\r\nああもうっ。冬ってどうして\r\nこうも太り: I cut back on sweets, and then… \nOh no. Why do I gain weight so easily \nin the winter…!
text.準備はできてるから、\r\nすぐに始めて。: I'm ready, so get started right away.
text.準備はできてるから、\r\nいつでも始められるよ。: I'm ready. We can start whenever you \nare.
text.周りは気にしない、気にしない…\r\nトレーニングに集中する…！: I don't care what's going on around \nme, I don't care… just focus on \ntraining…!
text.アタシは強くなりたい。\r\n…アンタはそのためのトレーナー。\r\nしっかりや: I want to be strong. …That's why I \nchoose you to be my trainer. \nSo do it well.
text.アタシは強くなりたい。\r\n…アンタはそのためのトレーナー。\r\nトレーニン: I want to be strong. …That's why I \nchoose you to be my trainer. \nI'll leave the training to you.
text.別に緊張とかしてない。\r\nアタシはアタシの走りをするだけ。: I'm not nervous or anything. I just \nwant to run my race.
text.鍛えるなら、今だよね。\r\nみんなに置いていかれないように\r\nしなくっちゃ: If I'm going to train, it's now. I have \nto make sure I don't get left behind \nby everyone else…!
text.メニューは考えてきた？\r\nなら、指示して。\r\nちゃんとこなしてみせるから: Have you thought of a menu? Then \ntell me what to do. I'll make sure you \nget it right.
text.メニューは考えてきた？\r\n…大丈夫。\r\n絶対にやり遂げてみせるから。: Have you thought of training menu? \n… Don't worry. I'll definitely get it \ndone.
text.…遠慮はいらないから。\r\nもっとアタシを強くして。: I don't want you to be shy. So make \nme stronger.
text.…アンタのことは\r\nトレーナーとしては信頼してる…。\r\nト、トレーナーと: I trust you as a trainer… Just as \ntrainer okay!
text.…トレーナーのことは、\r\nちゃんと信頼してるから…\r\nアタシもそれに応え: I trust my trainer, and I intend to \nrespond to that trust.
text.アンタがトレーナーでよかっ…\r\nな、なんでもない！: I'm glad you're my trainer. No, it's \nnothing!
text.これでも感謝してる…う、嘘じゃないから！: Even like this I'm grateful okay… \nI… I'm not lying!
text.これでも感謝してるんだ…ありがと！: I am grateful for this… thanks!
text.自分の限界を超えなきゃ…！: I have to push my limits…!
text.メジロドーベル…です。その、よろしく。: Mejiro Dober… Well, nice to meet you.
text.変わりたい…！\r\nだから、アタシは走り続ける！: I want to change…! That's \nwhy I keep running!
text.精一杯、頑張ろうね！: Let's do the best we can!
text.アタシを囲む視線、声…\r\nやめて――あっ！\r\nそうだ、アタシはアタシが見: The eyes surrounding me, the voices… Stop it! Yes, I'll go where I'm \nlooking at…!
text.自分を誇るって慣れないけど…悪くないね。: I'm not used to being proud of \nmyself, but… not bad.
text.やれたんだ…アタシにも！: I could do it… even me!
text.今日のログインボーナスだって。: She said it's today's login bonus.
text.昔のこと思い出すの、\r\nちょっと恥ずかしいかも…。: It's a little embarrassing to \nremember the past…
text.経験を積んで、レースにも\r\n慣れていかなくちゃ…！: I need to gain experience and get \nused to racing…!
text.名鑑レベルが上がったって。\r\n確認してみない？: She said the directory level has \ngone up. Would you like to check?
text.食らいついて、いくだけ…！: Just hang on and keep going…!
text.一緒に、なるべく、頑張る…。: Together, we will do our best, as \nmuch as possible…
text.できること、増えたかも。: I think I can do more.
text.力になりたい、アタシも…！: I want to help you, too.
text.この力…無駄にしない！: This power… will not be wasted!
text.可愛い…どれ、取るの？: Cute… which one, should I take?
text.みんなお揃いの制服だし、\r\n無駄に目立たないから好きだな。: I like them because they all have \nmatching uniforms, and they're not \nneedlessly conspicuous.
text.これ着てたらトレセン学園の生徒だって\r\nすぐわかるよね。しっかりしないと…。: If you wear this, it's easy to tell \nyou're a student of Tracen Academy. \nWe have to be firm…
text.こんなに可愛い衣装、\r\n似合ってないと思うんだけど…。: I don't think I look good in such a \ncute outfit…
text.ステージに立つのは緊張するけど、\r\nちゃんと感謝は伝えなくちゃ。: I am nervous to be on stage, but I \nhave to show my appreciation.
text.自分で決めた勝負服…\r\n胸を張って着なくちゃね。: This is the race outfit I choose for \nmyself… I have to wear them with \npride.
text.この衣装にふさわしい走り…\r\n必ず、してみせるから。: I'll make sure to run in a way that's \nappropriate for this outfit… I promise.
text.想いの強さなら、\r\nエアグルーヴ先輩にも負けない。\r\n…変わりたい。強く: If it's the strength of feelings, \nI won't lose even to Airgroove. \nI want to change. I want to be strong.
text.イベントミッションだって。\r\n…一応、アタシも\r\nやれるだけはやるつもり: It's event mission. I'm also going \nto do my best
text.イベントミッション、お疲れ様。\r\n報酬は受け取っておきなよ。\r\n…自分が: Good job on the event mission. You \nshould receive your reward. It's a \nproof of your hard work.
text.理想通りに、走ってみせる……！: I will run just like my ideal……!
text.寝起きは、別にそれほどよくはない\r\nけど…いろいろ支度が必要だから、\r\n: I'm not great at waing up, but… \nI have to get ready for a lot of things, \nso I just wake up while I'm doing it.
text.どうかな？髪のセット、少しは\r\n上手くいったと思うんだけど…！\r\nふふ、: How's it going? I think I did a \nlittle better with my hair…! I guess \nit was worth getting up early.
text.まだ眠いの？\r\n…涼しい格好でもすれば？\r\n少しは目も覚めるでしょ。: Still sleepy? ……Why don't you put on \nsomething cool? It will wake you up \na little.
text.もしかして、まだ眠い？…涼しい\r\n格好してみるといいよ。それで朝の\r\n風:
Maybe you're still sleepy? …You 
should try to dress up in a cooler 
outfit. The morning breeze will make 
your eyes clearer.
text.…あのさ、行きたいカフェがあるん\r\nだけど。栄養が豊富なメニューで…\r\n: There's this café I want to go to. It's got a really nutritious menu… So… \nare we going? or not?
text.ね、カフェに行かない？この服で\r\n一緒に出かけたいんだ。2人でお茶\r\nで:
Hey, do you want to go to a cafe? I'd 
like to go out with you in this dress, 
and we can have tea together… how 
about that?
text.食べ方が上品って…そういうの\r\n小さい頃に習うものでしょう？\r\n会食で恥:
Eating in an elegant way… isn't that 
something you learn when you are 
little? You don't want to be 
embarrassed at a dinner party…
text.…書類整理とか、手伝おうか？\r\nできることがあるのに、なにも\r\nしないの:
Do you need help with paperwork or 
something? I don't like the fact that 
you don't do anything when there is 
something you can do.
text.…たまには息抜きも大事だよ。\r\n散歩でもしてきたら？\r\n夜の空気って…落: …It's important to take a break once \nin a while. Why don't you go for a \nwalk? The night air is so relaxing.
text.まだ仕事？…ちょっとだけ散歩、\r\n一緒に行かない？少し息抜きしたら\r\n効:
Are you still working? …Why don't 
you come with me for a little walk? 
You might be more efficient if you 
take a break.
text.春の風、気をつけたほうがいいよ。\r\n帽子とか飛ばされると、捜すの\r\n大変:
You should be careful with the spring 
wind. If your hat or something gets 
blown away, it will be very hard to 
find it… I'll let you know.
text.春の風には気をつけてね。油断\r\nして帽子とか飛ばされちゃうと、\r\n追いか:
Be careful of the spring wind. If you 
are careless and your hat gets blown 
off, you will have a hard time 
chasing after it…
text.夏のバカンスって憧れるな…海風に\r\n帽子がさらわれて、砂浜のボトル\r\nメ:
Don't yearn for a summer vacation… 
The sea breeze blows away your hat, 
and you find bottle mail on the beach 
… too dreamy…?
text.京都にレース観に行かない？勉強に\r\nなりそうだし、紅葉もそろそろ…\r\nと:
Why don't we go to Kyoto to watch a 
race? It would be a good learning 
experience and the leaves will be 
changing soon……
text.涼しくなってきたし、\r\nレース観戦がてら遠出して\r\n京都で紅葉巡り…なん: How about going to Kyoto to see the \nautumn leaves?
text.寒いなら、温かいものでも飲めば？\r\n…ジンジャーティーでいいなら、\r\n分: If you're cold, why don't you have \nsomething warm to drink? …I'll share \na cup of ginger tea if you like.
text.寒かったら、いつでも言ってね。\r\n2人分のジンジャーティー、\r\nポットに: If you feel cold, just let me know. \nI've got a pot of ginger tea for two.
text.『モデルみたいで超イケてる！』\r\nって…パーマー、優しいからって\r\n褒め: 『You look super hot, like a model!』 \nPalmer, you are praising me too much…
text.これでお出かけするの、好きだけど\r\nついつい寄り道しちゃって、時間\r\nか: I like to go out with this, but I tend \nto take side trips and it takes a lot \nof time.
text.背中、見られてないよね…。\r\nはぁ…まさか日焼けのあと、\r\nこんなに消え: You don't see my back right? I never \nthought that after a sunburn, my skin \nwould never go away like this.
text.すんっ…ん、いい感じ。\r\n外出先に合わせてアロマ調合するの\r\n気分転換に: It's soooo… nnn, it's nice. It's good \nfor a change of pace, too.
text.そもそも学園で猛禽類を飼うのは\r\n危険じゃ…でもあんなに仲良しだし\r\n…:
It's not safe to keep a bird of prey 
in a school in the first place… but 
they are such good friends… we have 
to take care of them anyway.
text.ライアンにこの服のお礼したいな。\r\n今度はアタシが服を選ぶ、とか？\r\n…:
I would like to thank Ryan for these 
clothes. Maybe I can pick out the 
clothes this time? I'm going to go 
with something much cuter.
text.こういう髪のセット、ブライトは\r\n毎日やってるんだよね…あの\r\nふんわり: This is the kind of hair set-up Bright \ndoes every day… I can't copy that \nfluffy look.
text.あ、今朝のワンちゃんの毛。\r\n最近お散歩中に会うんだけど…\r\nふふっ、ヤ:
Oh, the hair of the dog this morning. 
I've been seeing her on our walks 
lately… Hmmm, she's so cute and 
naughty!
text.BBQって毎週末するものなの？\r\nいつも誘ってくれるんだけど…。\r\nあ…: Is BBQ something you do every \nweekend? They always invite me… \nah… or is that a joke from Taiki!
text.寝る前に本を読むと快眠できる…\r\nってロブロイが。よく寝られたら、\r\nロ:
Rob Roy said that reading a book 
before going to bed helps you sleep 
well… If you sleep well, you can 
thank Rob Roy.
text.活字っていいよ。就寝前に読むと、\r\nかなりぐっすり眠れるの…って、\r\nロ:
Print is fine. If you read it before 
going to bed, you can get a good 
night's sleep… I'm paraphrasing 
from Rob Roy.
text.ふふっ。…どうだろ？これなら、\r\n新入生も話しかけやすいかな？\r\nもうち:
Hmmm. …What do you think? Would 
this make it easier for new students 
to talk to me? Should I raise the 
corners of my mouth a little more?
text.陽射し強いし、帽子でも被ったら？\r\n熱中症予防につばが広いのを…って\r\n:
The sun is shining, why don't you 
wear a hat? I'm thinking of something 
with a wide brim to prevent heat 
stroke… but don't wear the same hat…!
text.夏の外出は、つばが広い帽子が\r\nいいよ！涼しいし、日焼けしないし\r\n…お:
When you go out in the summer, a 
wide-brimmed hat is the way to go! 
It's cooler, you don't get sunburned, 
and you can even match it up, right?
text.イギリスの紅葉って黄色が多いん\r\nだって…いや、暇だから調べて\r\nただけ:
I heard that most of the autumn 
leaves in England are yellow… No, 
I just looked it up because I have 
time on my hands. It's not that 
I want to go there…
text.イギリスの紅葉って黄色が多いん\r\nだって！宮殿とか絶対キレイ\r\nだよね…:
I heard that the leaves in England 
are mostly yellow! The palace is 
absolutely beautiful…! Maybe we can 
go together sometime…?
text.リボンで隠せば…いや、ダメ！\r\n動いて痩せないと…！余分なお肉は\r\n冬の:
If I hide it with ribbons… no, no! I 
need to move and lose weight. I'll 
get rid of the excess flesh in the 
winter…!
text.よし。リボンもしっかり結んだし、\r\n早く始めて。: All right. Now that the ribbons are \ntied, let's get to work.
text.よし。リボンもしっかり結んだし、\r\nいつ始めても大丈夫だよ！: All right. Now that the ribbons \nare tied up tight, we're ready \nto get started!
text.アスリート用のネイルだから\r\n期待してなかったけど、こうして\r\nみると、: I wasn't expecting it because it's an \nathlete's nail polish, but looking at \nit this way, it's pretty stylish…!
text.この服で走ると、\r\n自分が風になってる気がして…\r\n人の目が気にならない: When I run in this dress, I feel like \nI'm the wind… and I don't have to \nworry about people's eyes on me.
text.アタシも、先輩として、\r\nお手本にならないとだから。\r\nもっと…頑張りた: As a senior, I have to be a role \nmodel. I want to work harder.
text.先輩として頑張ってるとこ、\r\n後輩たちにちゃんと見せたいんだ。\r\n…アタ: I want to show the juniors that I'm \ndoing my best as a senior. Even I can \ndo it too, right?
text.外周でも、なんでもこなすよ。\r\n周りを気にしてるようじゃ、\r\nまだまだだ:
I'll do whatever it takes, even if 
it's on the perimeter. If I'm still 
worried about my surroundings,I 
still have a long way to go…!
text.最近、人目が嫌じゃない気がする。\r\nライアンが選んでくれた服と、\r\n誰か:
I feel like I don't mind being seen 
these days. Maybe it's because of the 
clothes Ryan picked out for me and 
thanks to a certain someone… a little?
text.最近、人目が嫌じゃない気がする。\r\nライアンが選んでくれた服と、\r\nトレ:
I feel like I don't mind being seen 
these days. I think it's because of 
the clothes Ryan picked out for me 
and the Trainer.
text.ねえ、次行くって言ってたとこ、\r\n行ったことある場所？ない場所？\r\nどっ:
Hey, that place you said you were 
going next, is it somewhere you've 
been before? Or not? I don't care 
which one you've been to, but you 
need to decide quickly.
text.次はどこ行くんだったっけ？\r\n行ったことある場所？ない場所？\r\nどっちで: Where were we going next? \nSomewhere you've been before? Or \nsomewhere you haven't? I don't care which one, as long as we're together.
text.一緒なら、どこにでも\r\n行ける気が…する、かも。: I feel like we can go anywhere \ntogether… maybe.
text.旅路の想い出が、\r\n1番のお土産かもね。: The best souvenirs may be the \nmemories of the journey.
text.せっかくだし、\r\n記念にどっか行く？: Since we're here, do you want to go \nsomewhere to commemorate the \noccasion?
text.帽子よしっ。…メジロドーベル。よろしく。: Hat Good. …Mejiro Dober. Nice \nto meet you.
text.新鮮な風や水…\r\n直に感じられるのってすごくいいんだよね。: Fresh wind, water… it's so nice to \nfeel it directly.
text.次はどこに行くの？\r\n予定、立てとかないとでしょ。: Where are you going next? We have \nto make plans, don't we?
text.どこか出かけない？\r\n…気分転換って感じで、さ。: Wanna go out somewhere? …just for a change, you know?
text.ん？わぁ…あ、待って！\r\nわぁ～！見せてくれてありがと、ん…うふふっ♪: Hmm? Wow… oh, wait! Wow! Thanks for showing me… ufufu♪
text.アタシについてきて。\r\n次はもっといいとこ、連れて行ってあげるから。: Follow me. I'll take you to a better \nplace next time.
text.アタシと勝負を？\r\n…うん、わかった。\r\n精一杯、頑張るよ！: You want to race with me? \n… Okay, got it. \nI'll do my best!
text.すごい…でも、\r\nアタシもまだまだやれる！\r\nガッカリはさせないから！: Great… but I can still do it! I won't \nlet you down!
text.バーベキュープラン込みで、\r\n釣竿、自転車のレンタルも可能…！\r\n…うん:
Included in the barbecue plan, 
fishing rods and bicycles are 
available for rent…! You'll 
have a great time!
text.夏の夜って不思議。\r\n少しだけ、素直になれる気がする。: Summer nights are strange. I feel \nlike I can be a little more honest.
text.タイキが写真たくさんくれたんだ。\r\nいつの間に撮ったのって写真も\r\nたく: Taiki gave me a lot of pictures. \nThere were so many photos that I \nwondered when she took them.
text.ふぁ…今日は早く寝ようかな。\r\n…と、その前に。キャンプのこと、\r\nライ: Whew… I think I'll go to bed early \ntoday. But first. Let's go tell Ryan \nabout the camp.
